name: Duoc Nguyen
tagline: Pi-shaped engineer: Backend/AI × Agents/MCP × Product iteration
bio: I'm an Engineering Manager at FireGroup, building backend systems and AI tooling that solve real problems.
13 years of shipping code, 5K+ commits across 431 repos. I work in Go and TypeScript, focusing on developer tools, MCP servers, and AI agents.
On the side, I run aiocean.io, building practical AI tools like Clik (desktop AI assistant) and Open Gate (Obsidian web integration).
I write about engineering and product thinking at 12bit.vn and onepercent.plus — exploring how to build better, ship faster, and think clearer.
Back in 2016, I co-founded Vue.js Vietnam, one of the first Vue.js communities in Southeast Asia. These days I'm deep in AI tooling and MCP protocols.
I believe in Pi-shaped skills: deep technical expertise (backend, real-time systems) combined with broad context (AI agents, product iteration, developer experience).
I care about tools that respect your time, code that's easy to change, and products that actually matter to people who use them.
